item.title: Ramble On- Colorado State University Hosts One of Largest Solar Plants at a U.S. University
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9HbgzSNeJGA Did you know that Colorado State University is home to one of the largest solar plants at a U.S. university? The plant, located on the Foothills Campus (west…
